channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Redditユーザー：Netflixは、最も安い月額11.99ドルの広告なし層を段階的に廃止し、代わりに6.99ドル、15.49ドル、22.99ドルの層を推し進めるという計画を実行している（Emma Roth/The Verge）。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Reddit users: Netflix is following through on its plan to phase out its cheapest $11.99/month ad-free tier, instead pushing its $6.99, $15.49, and $22.99 tiers  —  Netflix is following through on its plan to phase out its cheapest ad-free tier for existing subscribers.

item.title: ジャーナリストに必要なのは、大統領に無制限の権力を与える米連邦準備制度理事会（SCOTUS）の判決を受け、"両方の立場 "を提示するような非効率的な方式を否定することだ（ダン・ギルモア
item.description:
Dan Gillmor:
Journalists need to reject formulas that have made them ineffective, like presenting “both sides”, after the SCOTUS ruling giving presidents unrestricted power  —  This is the first in a series of posts.  —  Dear journalists: This is your moment.

item.title: メモニューズ・コーポレーションのロバート・トムソンCEOは、OpenAIの契約締結から数週間後、同社が少なくとも1社のジェネレーティブAI企業に対する法的措置を検討していることを明らかにした（John Buckley/Capital Brief）。
item.description:
John Buckley / Capital Brief:
Memo: News Corp CEO Robert Thomson signals the company is weighing legal action against at least one generative AI firm, weeks after finalizing an OpenAI deal  —  In the memo, the CEO shared more detail on his approach to generative AI, which he considers a major risk to journalism — even as the company strikes deals with AI firms.

item.title: 裁判官は、企業や機械の力を優先して人間の主権を抑圧するために、憲法修正第1条の言論の自由を乗っ取ることを許してきた（Tim Wu/New York Times）
item.description:
Tim Wu / New York Times:
Judges have allowed First Amendment free speech rights to be hijacked to suppress the sovereignty of humans in favor of the power of companies and machines  —  The First Amendment was written in the 18th century with the noble and vitally important goal of ensuring robust political debate and a free press.

item.title: 情報筋スカイダンスがナショナル・アミューズメンツに17億5000万ドルを支払うことで予備合意に達し、パラマウントの他の入札者がオファーを出せる45日間の期間を設けることで合意。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Skydance reached a preliminary deal to pay $1.75B for National Amusements and agreed to a 45-day period where other Paramount bidders can make offers  —  Skydance would pay $1.75 billion for National Amusements under the preliminary deal  —  David Ellison's production company …

item.title: Snapchatが新機能を追加、Snapchat+加入者がSnap Mapでパーソナライズされた家をデザインしたり、0.5秒未満のSnapを送信できるように（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Snapchat adds new features, including letting Snapchat+ subscribers design a personalized house on Snap Map and send Snaps that last less than .5 seconds  —  Snapchat is introducing new ways for users to personalize their accounts, the company announced on Tuesday.

item.title: 情報筋：SkydanceとShari RedstoneのNational Amusementsとの交渉が再開。
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: talks between Skydance and Shari Redstone's National Amusements resume, just weeks after the parties called off initial negotiations  —  Just weeks after the Paramount's controlling shareholder and Skydance scuttled their talks about a potential deal, the two media companies have tentatively agreed to a merger.

item.title: ロンドン証券取引所グループはダウ・ジョーンズと提携し、ニュースとデータを共有する。両社は2025年にLSEGのワークスペース・プラットフォームにキュレーションされたニュース・スペースを設ける予定（Yadarisa Shabong/ロイター）
item.description:
Yadarisa Shabong / Reuters:
The London Stock Exchange Group partners with Dow Jones to share news and data; the companies plan a curated news space in LSEG's Workspace platform in 2025  —  The London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG.L) announced a multi-year news and data partnership with Dow Jones that will include content …

item.title: NFLのサンデーチケットの商業権を持つEverPass Media社が、商業施設でスポーツのライブストリーミングを可能にするサービスUPshow社を買収（Lillian Rizzo/CNBC）
item.description:
Lillian Rizzo / CNBC:
EverPass Media, which has commercial rights to NFL's Sunday Ticket, acquires UPshow, a service that enables live sports streaming at commercial establishments  —  A satellite dish is no longer the only way bars and restaurants can air the National Football League's package of “Sunday Ticket” games.

item.title: 情報筋パラマウント・グローバルがBETを16億～17億ドルで売却するため、BETのスコット・ミルズCEOやCCキャピタルを経営するチン・チュー氏らと独占交渉中。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Paramount Global is in exclusive talks to sell BET for $1.6B-$1.7B to buyers that include BET CEO Scott Mills and Chinh Chu, who runs CC Capital  —  - Discussing offer from BET CEO and CC Capital's Chinh Chu  — New interest after Paramount talks with Skydance fell apart

item.title: Googleが2024年3月にAIスパムをターゲットにするよう調整したにもかかわらず、Google検索ではAIスパムがオリジナルの報告よりも上位に表示されることがある（Reece Rogers/Wired）
item.description:
Reece Rogers / Wired:
AI spam still sometimes ranks higher than original reporting in Google Search despite Google's adjustments to target AI spam in March 2024  —  Google adjusted its policies to target AI spam earlier this year, but plagiarizing content still comes up higher in search results months later—and SEO experts aren't sure why.

item.title: 出典ハリウッドをはじめとする映画制作者向けのジェネレーティブAIビデオに注力するスタートアップRunwayが、約40億ドルの評価額で4億5000万ドルの資金調達に向けた交渉を進めている（Stephanie Palazzolo/The Information）。
item.description:
Stephanie Palazzolo / The Information:
Source: Runway, a startup focusing on generative AI video for Hollywood and other filmmakers, is in talks to raise $450M at about a $4B valuation  —  Runway, already the best funded among a cluster of startups developing artificial intelligence software to generate videos for Hollywood …

item.title: マストドンは、記事リンクの下にクリック可能な傍線を追加し、著者のfediverseアカウントを指し示す。この機能を使用しているパブには、The VergeとMacRumorsが含まれる（Eugen Rochko/Mastodon Blog）
item.description:
Eugen Rochko / Mastodon Blog:
Mastodon adds clickable bylines under article links, pointing to the author's fediverse account; The Verge and MacRumors are among the pubs using the feature  —  A new feature for media organizations, journalists and bloggers  —  To reinforce and encourage Mastodon as the go-to place for journalism …

item.title: パラマウントによるMTVニュースの閉鎖を受け、Internet ArchiveはMTV.com/newsで公開されていた460,575のウェブページの検索可能なインデックスを作成した。
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Following Paramount's takedown of MTV News, the Internet Archive has assembled a searchable index of 460,575 web pages earlier published at MTV.com/news  —  MTV News lives!  Well, sort of. … You can search the MTV News archive on the organization's Wayback Machine at this link.

item.title: ジェネレーティブAI音楽サービス「Suno」が米国でiOSアプリをローンチ、世界展開とAndroidアプリも計画（Lloyd Coombes/Tom's Guide）
item.description:
Lloyd Coombes / Tom's Guide:
Generative AI music service Suno launches its iOS app in the US, with plans for a global rollout and an Android app  —  An AI studio in your pocket.  —  You're in luck if you've ever wanted to make music using Suno while away from your computer.  It is now available on iOS — at least, it is if you're in the U.S.
